item.title: Don't Want to Create a Ton of Getters/Setters? Say Hello to the Abstract Document Pattern.
item.description: In this post, I talk about the Abstract Document pattern, which allows one to pseudo-dynamically create properties for a model. While keeping the type safety that statically typed languages like Java provide.
